job.title: Linux BSP Engineer (m/f/d)
job.description:
Youprobably have never heard of us – but we’re sure you’ve listened through us.

StreamUnlimited is a main player in the field of Chromecast built-in ™, Google Voice Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Apple AirPlay2 and top-notch audio technology. We are building the technology behind the worlds most renowned brands in smart speakers, hi-fi music equipment and music streaming apps.

It’s very likely that you have a product at home driven by software developed by us.

So, since you’re already familiar with us – maybe you’d like to pay us a visit too. And even stay. Because you might find our company a great place to work.

Tasks

  • You contribute to our BSP development for both internal and customer projects as embedded Linux software developer.
  • Your work involves tailoring the Linux Kernel for our target platforms (NXP, AMLogic, Qualcomm,...) by supporting Yocto layers.
  • You share your knowledge with colleagues and gain yours by actively colaborating beyond projects and work packages.

Requirements

  • You are proficient in Linux Kernel development, ideally kernel drivers, device trees, and also the U-Boot bootloader.
  • You have sophisticated C language skills, C++ is of advantage, too.
  • You are well familiar with the Yocto or OpenEmbedded projects, or similar tools to create individual Linux distributions.
  • Working with embedded systems is your passion, you are not afraid of oscilloscopes and soldering irons.
  • You are able to read schematics and understand commonly used electrical interface busses (I2C, SPI, I2S for audio) in hardware and software.

Benefits

  • A team oriented, informal and international work environment.
  • A growing company with development perspectives.
  • Good accessibility (underground station nearby), free parking.
  • Several benefits: free gym, subsidized canteen, regular company gatherings, flexible working hours
  • Part of your work visible on company github https://github.com/streamunlimited and sometime also upstream.
  • Skilled HW department in Vienna which can even do BGA reworks.

Sounds great? Then please send us your application!
